titles.title: PARTNERS Act of 2023
PARTNERS Act of 2023
Promoting Apprenticeships through Regional Training Networks for Employers Required Skills Act of 2023

To promote registered apprenticeships and other work-based learning programs for small and medium-sized businesses within in-demand industry sectors, through the establishment and support of industry or sector partnerships.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
